events.cooldown: [🕓] - Are you in a hurry? You were taxed in *{{time}} *, wait a little bit there
events.nodb: [💡] This command requires a configured database.

choose.desc: In doubt about what to do? Choose this or that
examples: I should do this, I shouldn't do that
Go to the gym, play GTA 6

gemini.usage: [CLEAN: Erases the historical] [Reset: Erases Memories and History] <Prompt> [(Media)]
examples: (image) summarize the text of this image
What is the population of New York?
Clean Do you remember what I asked you yesterday?

rank.desc: See the rank of members who talked the most in the group

sticker.usage: <(Image/Video)> [Number: Image Quality from 1 to 100 (Standard: 1)] [RMBG: Remove the background from an image]

clean.desc: Hide your crimes erasing the latest group messages (requires administrator permission)
clean.noAmount: "Clean 0"? Do you think here is your room that you do not clean anything?
clean.deleted: I will erase the last {{msgsSize}} messages and then I will go back to sleep right here on my network

everyone.desc: Mention all users of a group in a single message

remove.desc: Remove the background from an image

examples: pt the cat in the hat
